item.title: 阿斯利康输给汇丰银行，失去英国最有价值公司宝座
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）降低药品价格的计划导致全球制药公司股价下跌，阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）失去了英国最有价值上市公司的桂冠。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc lost its crown as the UK’s most valuable listed company after US President Donald Trump’s plans to lower drug prices sent shares of pharmaceuticals companies lower across the world.】

item.title: 更多股票应声反弹，S&P闪现看涨信号
item.description: 有很多理由对股市近期的上涨表示怀疑：贸易协议进展甚微，经济数据不佳，美国公司的前景也是多年来最差的。尽管如此，至少有一项指标表明，投资者对大小公司的信心正在增强。【原文：There are plenty of reasons to doubt the stock market’s recent advance — trade-deal progress is scant, economic data is souring and outlooks from US firms are the worst in years. In spite all of that, one measure, at least, suggests that investor confidence is growing in companies both big and small.】

item.title: 据说 TA Associates 正在考虑出售价值 10 亿美元的 Accion Labs 大部分股份
item.description: 熟悉该计划的人士表示，TA Associates 正在考虑出售其在 Accion Labs Holdings Inc.【原文：TA Associates is considering selling its majority stake in Accion Labs Holdings Inc. and seeking a valuation of about $1 billion for the Pittsburgh-based technology company, people familiar with the plan said.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称股价反弹尚未完全结束
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师表示，美国股市情绪正在好转，但投资者现在就吹响 "警报 "还为时过早。【原文：Sentiment toward the US stock market is improving but it’s too early for investors to sound the all-clear, according to Morgan Stanley strategists.】

item.title: NHK 称日产大规模裁员达 2 万人
item.description: 据日本国家广播公司周一报道，日产汽车公司将裁员1.1万人，超过此前的计划，这是该公司重组其濒临破产的业务计划的一部分。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. will eliminate 11,000 more jobs than it previously planned, Japan’s national broadcaster reported Monday, as part of a plan to restructure its flailing business.】

item.title: 空中出租车初创公司 Vertical 向混合动力转型，向国防领域发展
item.description: 垂直航空航天有限公司（Vertical Aerospace Ltd）正在为其电池驱动的空中出租车制造一种混合动力变体，以赌长航时飞机能从利润丰厚的国防部门吸引投资。【原文：Vertical Aerospace Ltd is building a hybrid variant of its battery-powered air taxi, in a bet that a longer-range aircraft will attract investment from the lucrative defense sector.】

item.title: Absa 看准东非房地产市场繁荣，欲向肯尼亚扩张
item.description: 南非第三大贷款机构 Absa Group Ltd. 发现东非房地产投资者的兴趣正在激增，计划加强资产负债表以满足融资需求。【原文：Absa Group Ltd., South Africa’s third-biggest lender, is seeing surging interest among real estate investors in East Africa and plans to bolster its balance sheet to meet demand for financing.】

item.title: 希腊希望提前十年偿还救助贷款
item.description: 希腊财政部长基里亚科斯-皮埃尔拉卡基斯（Kyriakos Pierrakakis）表示，希腊计划提前10年偿还首个救助计划的贷款，此举将减轻该国未来的债务负担。【原文：Greece plans to repay loans from its first bailout program 10 years ahead of schedule, Finance Minister Kyriakos Pierrakakis said, a move that’s set to ease the country’s debt burden in the future.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织计划对肯尼亚债务进行审查，以权衡新政中的资金需求
item.description: 国际货币基金组织计划对肯尼亚的债务进行深入审查，以确定该国在一项新计划下的融资需求。【原文：The International Monetary Fund plans an in-depth review of Kenya’s debt to determine the nation’s financing needs under a new program.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 Flynas 公司寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 11 亿美元的资金
item.description: 由亿万富翁阿尔瓦利德-本-塔拉勒王子（Prince Alwaleed bin Talal）支持的沙特阿拉伯 Flynas Co.公司计划通过首次公开募股筹集 41 亿里亚尔（合 11 亿美元）的资金，尽管全球市场动荡不安，但中东地区的上市势头依然强劲。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Flynas Co., backed by billionaire Prince Alwaleed bin Talal, aims to raise up to 4.1 billion riyals ($1.1 billion) from its initial public offering, as listings across the Middle East gain momentum despite global market volatility.】

item.title: 科博尔特控股公司计划在伦敦进行两年来最大规模的首次公开募股
item.description: 科博尔特控股公司（Cobalt Holdings Plc）公布了在伦敦首次公开发行股票的计划，这可能是两年多来英国首次公开发行股票规模最大的一次。【原文：Cobalt Holdings Plc unveiled plans for an initial public offering in London in what could potentially be the biggest UK first-time share sale in more than two years.】

item.title: 铃木躲避特朗普关税，马自达暂缓发布盈利指引
item.description: 马自达汽车公司（Mazda Motor Co.）和大多数全球汽车制造商一样，因美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战而短期前景黯淡，因此马自达汽车公司暂缓发布年度利润指导。【原文：Mazda Motor Co. withheld its annual profit guidance after its short-term future, along with most global carmakers, was muddied by US President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 大众汽车出售绿色混合债券，发行商抢滩市场
item.description: 在中美贸易谈判取得进展的背景下，大众汽车公司将出售以欧元计价的绿色混合动力债券，从而拉开本周繁忙的公司债券发行序幕。【原文：Volkswagen AG is selling euro-denominated green hybrid bonds, kicking off what’s expected to be a busy week of corporate bond issuance amid progress in US-China trade talks.】

item.title: 埃及签署延长液化天然气进口的终端长期协议
item.description: 埃及与 Höegh Evi 有限公司签署了一项为期 10 年的浮式液化天然气进口终端协议，标志着这个北非国家将长期依赖燃料进口。【原文：Egypt signed a 10-year deal with Höegh Evi Ltd. for a floating liquefied natural gas import terminal, signaling the North African nation’s long-term dependency on fuel imports.】

item.title: EDP 表示确信美国将继续为可再生能源提供税收优惠
item.description: 葡萄牙公用事业公司 EDP SA 首席执行官米格尔-斯蒂尔韦尔-德安德拉德（Miguel Stilwell d'Andrade）表示，葡萄牙公用事业公司 EDP SA 确信，在唐纳德-特朗普总统执政期间，美国可再生能源项目的税收减免政策将继续有效。【原文：Portuguese utility EDP SA is confident that tax credits for renewable projects in the US will remain in place under the administration of President Donald Trump, Chief Executive Officer Miguel Stilwell d’Andrade said.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判取得突破后美元大涨
item.description: 中美贸易谈判取得突破，双方同意在 90 天内暂时降低部分关税，市场对此作出反应，美元跳涨，政府债券遭到抛售。【原文：The dollar jumped and government bonds sold off as markets reacted to a breakthrough in trade talks between China and the US, which agreed to temporarily lower some tariffs for 90 days.】

item.title: 管道费用飙升，南非供应商用卡车运送燃料
item.description: 由于使用 Transnet SOC 有限公司运营的国家主要输油管道的成本激增，南非燃料供应商正寻求利用卡车向内陆运输燃料。【原文：South African fuel suppliers are looking to utilize trucks to transport the commodity inland as the cost of using the nation’s main pipeline operated by Transnet SOC Ltd. surges.】

item.title: 中美同意在 90 天内大幅削减关税
item.description: 根据在日内瓦发表的联合声明，美国和中国将暂时降低对对方产品的关税，此举旨在为贸易紧张局势降温，并为世界上最大的两个经济体再提供三个月的时间来解决分歧。【原文：The US and China will temporarily lower tariffs on each other’s products, according to a joint statement released in Geneva, in a move to cool trade tensions and give the world’s two largest economies three more months to resolve their differences.】

item.title: 石油暴跌导致收益受损，阿美债务升至三年新高
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）的净债务上升到近三年来的最高点，即使在削减了巨额红利之后，仍给这个世界上最大的石油出口国的财政带来了压力。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s net debt rose to the highest in almost three years, piling pressure on the finances of the world’s biggest oil exporter even after cutting its massive dividend.】

item.title: 日本商人因关税问题心情跌至三年来最差
item.description: 日本商人的情绪降至三年多来的最低点，凸显出随着美国关税的影响开始渗透到经济中，人们对国内外经济前景的担忧日益加深。【原文：Sentiment among Japanese merchants sank to the lowest in more than three years, underscoring deepening concerns over the economic outlook at home and abroad as the impact from US tariffs begins to filter into the economy.】

item.title: 第一生命将增持英国对冲基金 Capula 股份至 15
item.description: 第一生命控股公司（Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc.【原文：Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc. said on Monday that it plans to make an additional investment in UK-based Capula Investment Management, aiming to strengthen its ability to oversee non-traditional assets.】

item.title: 消费者抱怨电动汽车营销，小米股价下跌
item.description: 当地媒体上周末报道称，有300多人希望取消SU7 Ultra电动汽车的订单，原因是该汽车的引擎盖设计存在 "虚假宣传"，小米公司股价周一在香港下跌了5.7%。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. shares dropped as much as 5.7% in Hong Kong on Monday after a local media report over the weekend that said more than 300 people want to cancel their SU7 Ultra electric vehicle orders on “false advertising” about the design of the vehicle’s hood.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司要求贷款人接管以避免破产
item.description: 澳大利亚医院运营商 Healthscope Ltd. 由布鲁克菲尔德公司（Brookfield Corp.【原文：Australian hospital operator Healthscope Ltd., owned by a unit of Brookfield Corp., is trying to avoid company receivership by asking lenders to support a plan that will give them board control, after struggling to pay interest on an outstanding A$1.6 billion ($1 billion) loan.】

item.title: 月度计划推动印度股票基金流入量连创新高
item.description: 由于近期的市场波动减少了对共同基金的一次性投资，印度的股票基金流入量近五年来连续创下新高，对每月经常性计划的依赖程度超过以往任何时候。【原文：India’s nearly five-year record streak of equity fund inflows is relying on monthly recurring plans more than ever before, as recent market volatility has reduced lumpsum investments in mutual funds.】

item.title: 日本 30 年期债券收益率升至近 25 年来的最高点
item.description: 由于中美贸易谈判带来的乐观情绪鼓励了避险资产的抛售，日本 30 年期国债收益率攀升至近 25 年来的最高水平。【原文：Japan’s 30-year government bond yield climbed to its highest level in almost 25 years as optimism from US-China trade talks encouraged selling of haven assets.】

item.title: 直播：中美贸易进展提振股市，富时 100 指数将上涨
戈卢布支持的沙特公司启动人工智能基金，推动美国与中东地区的关系
item.description: 一家由美国亿万富翁劳伦斯-戈鲁布（Lawrence Golub）家族办公室支持的沙特阿拉伯风险投资公司正在启动一项价值 5000 万美元的基金，投资于中东和旧金山湾区的人工智能初创企业。【原文：A Saudi Arabia-based venture capital firm that’s backed by the family office of US billionaire Lawrence Golub is launching a $50 million fund to invest in artificial intelligence startups across the Middle East and the San Francisco Bay Area.】

item.title: 新兴资产上涨，因谈判后关税最坏影响有望结束
item.description: 在中美两国官员宣布贸易谈判取得实质性进展后，新兴市场资产上涨，原因是人们乐观地认为，关税紧张局势的最坏时期可能已经过去。【原文：Emerging-market assets rose on optimism the worst of tariff tensions may have passed after US and Chinese officials touted substantial progress in their trade discussions.】
